place_description:
Welcome to Kunu Coffee Huntersville, a specialty coffee bar located just inside Lake Forest Huntersville. We're here to spread positive vibes around Lake Norman, NC through artisanal coffee and tea. Our baristas make every drink with precision, using only the highest quality, ethically-sourced beans, locally sourced A2 milks and organic syrups.
Whether you're working remote or need a place to bring the kids, Kunu Coffee is your go-to spot to jump start your weekday morning or brighten up your weekend. Order ahead on the app to skip the line and have your order ready for pickup.

reviews_data.review_text: When this location opened, they marketed themselves with better prices than the precious shop (Defined Coffee). Now that you're charging $7 for a cold brew (don't forget the tip prompt), I don't see how that's even possible. I used to drop by frequently, but I feel like I can't go to a place with prices like this anymore - I don't want to help the normalization of a coffee with a bunch of ice in it having such an elevated price.

Love this place! Yummy coffee, with milk substitutes like oat milk and almond milk if you are like me and prefer the non dairy lattes. It is inside the Lake Forest Church, but there is a ton of space inside and outside to sit and do work or chat with friends. They also have a little kid corner if you wanted to bring little ones for a playdate while you sip your drink or enjoy a pastry. The staff is very friendly also!

My 1st time at Kunu.  Love the vibe .
It was kinda difficult to know which door was their business. Need more visible signage.
I ordered a few pastries to try and was disappointed.  They were dry.  Also there was only one employee behind the counter.  Waited about 15-20 min b4 got service.
Amazing relaxing location with an tremendous view and atmosphere.  Love the drinks and amazing baristas!
Service was excellent and coffee was just right! Would like to go again.
Amazing coffee on our road trip
Very chill and welcoming atmosphere. One of the best chai lattes I've ever had!

Had a lovely work session, breakfast, and strolled around the prayer garden.

Yes, this coffee shop is part of the Lake Forest Church campus. Honestly, I wondered if that would be odd but it was a very friendly space.

I had a chai latte (with oat milk)and cranberry muffin. Both were excellent. I do wish they had a London fog option!

WiFi was solid. Plenty of space inside and out. I'll be back!

Kunu Coffee Shop is currently struggling with a significant understaffing issue that impacts both customers and employees. During my visit, there was only one staff member handling both coffee brewing and billing responsibilities. Despite her commendable effort and hard work, the wait time was unreasonably long - over 10 minutes with just two people ahead in line. All three of us customers experienced the same extended wait. While the employee deserves praise for managing multiple tasks single-handedly, this situation reflects poorly on the coffee shop's management. They urgently need to hire additional staff to provide an efficient service experience and create a more manageable workload for their employees. Such extended wait times for a simple coffee order are unacceptable and could drive away potential regular customers if not addressed promptly.

I absolutely love Kunu coffee! The service is incredible, they are always so kind to me when I go. The drinks are amazing they never seize to fail me. The environment is amazing, if you would ever need to study and do some schooling, it's perfect for that!!
I ordered the pumpkin latte (oatmilk). Everyone was so kind, and the store interior was pretty :)
Hands down the best chai tea and coffee I think I have had. Excellent 10/10 service and so family friendly. In town from Florida. Thanks for amazing service!
The best

Delicious coffee, spectacular pastries, and very friendly staff!

This coffee shop is just inside the church building.

My daughter and I had a great time stopping by here- I love the atmosphere and seating options- so many diverse seating options.

This place is certainly worth a visit- just beware- their pastries go fast because there that good!!

Lovely space to enjoy a conversation, collaboration meetings, and get work done. Wifi is good quality. Outdoor seating is available with the fireplace, picnic tables for groups, and smaller tables. Kunu offers classic coffee shop selections and a few specialties, like "Teddy" latte - one of my favorites.
The coffee is super good!! And lots of cute seating options

Kunu Coffee is a gem! With a cozy atmosphere and friendly staff, it's the perfect spot to meet friends or get some work done. The coffee is top-notch--far better than any chain--and the muffins are delicious. The baristas are not only skilled but also great to chat with. Highly recommend this place for a fantastic coffee experience!

Great coffee shop with lots of space to sit.  They have both indoor and outdoor seating available.  I had a hot almond milk latte, which was delicious. They offer both coffee and non coffee drinks,  hot and cold.  They also have a selection of snack options and pastries. This is a great place to get work done quielty, read or meet up with a few people! Lots of parking available!

I came to this coffee shop based on the great reviews and atmosphere from the photos. I found the coffee to be overpriced, and my the shot in my dirty chai was burned. I was disappointed in the drink that I spent almost $9 on and threw 75% of it away. The space was aesthetically pleasant but unbelievably noisy and busy.

What I wish was advertised on google was that this coffee shop is inside of a church. Nothing against it, just not the atmosphere I was looking for as a place to study for several hours. There was also summer camp going on at that time so it was bustling with kids and very noisy. Again, nothing against it, it just wasn't what I was looking for and would have chosen a different coffee shop given that information.
Best coffee in town

Loved their iced latte (no add-ons)! Very smooth and flavorful. I was initially hesitant to try this coffee shop because there weren't many reviews yet, but I will definitely be back! The barista was really nice, and the interior was welcoming with a lot of different seating options.

I took chai tea latte, and it was amazing.
I'm not sure about food options.

I absolutely loved my experience at this coffee shop! I'm giving it five stars without hesitation. The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful, making me feel welcomed right away. The muffin I had was hands down the best I've ever tasted - fresh, moist, and bursting with flavor. And let's talk about the coffee - it was absolutely delicious, just the perfect blend for my taste buds. This place is definitely a gem and I can't wait to go back!

I get the pleasure of sharing an "office" with kunu coffee Huntersville. Their entire menu is well crafted and priced. I'm impressed with their love for their community, the kindness and care of owners and staff, the innovative menu options, and the consistent excellent service to their patrons.
Excellent new coffee spot! Hands down the best dirty chai latte I've had in the area. Other lattes and coffee are delicious as well. Check them out!

OMG my new fav coffee shop. Only 1.5 miles away from me so i walked to meet my brother. Baristas were so kind and didn't roll their eyes at me when i said i didn't know what i wanted besides no sugar, they gave me a recommendation of cold brew and i added oat milk. So good!!! Plenty of luxury seating inside in addition to the plentiful seating with and without shade outside. There's also a disc golf course so we had a great time chatting, sipping, and walking and relaxing. Highly recommend. Could believe how empty it was for a Saturday at 10am but I've lived here for 3 years and just now found it so maybe they need to advertise more. Hopefully this review will help more ppl find Kunu!!!
Formerly Defined..still great coffee and service!  Thank you, Terrance and team

This coffee shop is fantastic! The coffee is delicious and so are the pastries but that's not all! The employees are so nice and friendly! During my visit Terence took my order and Brooke prepared it. I ordered an iced "The Brunette" with an added flavor of blackberry and almond milk along with a blueberry muffin. Something that really stands out is they do not charge extra for alternative milks and the prices include tax already! If you're in the area I highly recommend you stop by!
Great coffee at a great price!

Simply the best specialty coffee in the North Charlotte area. The owners continue to impress with not only their expertise but their care for the coffee they offer. Kunu Coffee Company is obsessed with loving people through beautifully crafted coffee, and I'm here for it.
Best coffee around! My kids love playing in the play area while I enjoy a delicious latte!
Love this place ! The baristas and managers are second to none! Love that the drinks are less expensive with Kunu! Amazing drinks and variety. And the rewards systems are great
